title: Looking into Databases: Developing with Dbase IV
brief_description: This program takes a new database user beyond the basics to an understanding of the meaning and operation of “relational” database systems. The narrator shows how a block diagram of a working library system can be developed and then using dBase 1V, “converted” into files and programs complete with modem menus.
